checkpoints.name: Label Created (Bing Bong vs Printer)
checkpoints.msg: Bing Bong fought the label printer. The printer won. Bing Bong is plotting a rematch.

checkpoints.name: Dispatch Prep (Snack Audit)
checkpoints.msg: Bing Bong is auditing snacks like a tiny accountant with a head injury.

checkpoints.name: Departed Facility (WHEEEE)
checkpoints.msg: The parcel moved. Bing Bong squeaked. This is now a sport.

checkpoints.name: In Transit (Turbulence Arc)
checkpoints.msg: Turbulence happened. Bing Bong achieved enlightenment briefly, then forgot it immediately.

checkpoints.name: Plane Crash: Mysterious Island
checkpoints.msg: Bad news: crash. Good news: Bing Bong is now the emotional support Scout of the expedition.

checkpoints.name: Shore Camp (Short Rest Scam)
checkpoints.msg: Bing Bong declared a short rest. Everyone rested. Nobody asked questions.

checkpoints.name: Climb Begins (Stamina: 0)
checkpoints.msg: Bing Bong attempted stamina management. He spent all stamina on vibes.

checkpoints.name: Biome: Roots / Forest Shenanigans
checkpoints.msg: Bing Bong is weaving through roots like he owns the terrain. He does not.

checkpoints.name: Biome: Caldera (Hot Bad Decisions)
checkpoints.msg: Bing Bong approached lava, reconsidered, and filed an official complaint with the sun.

checkpoints.name: The PEAK (Flare Lit)
checkpoints.msg: Bing Bong reached the PEAK. A flare was launched. Rescue is (probably) on the way.

checkpoints.name: DELIVERED TO PEV ✅
checkpoints.msg: Bing Bong has arrived. He requests snacks, a warm shelf, and to be praised like a tiny hero.

scans.title: LABEL CREATED
scans.desc: A shipping label appeared. Bing Bong stared at it like it owed him money.

scans.title: DISPATCH PREP
scans.desc: Bing Bong filed Form SQUEAK-17 (Request: More Snacks). It was approved by nobody.

scans.title: SHIPPED (EST.)
scans.desc: Parcel departed. Bing Bong yelled “WE RIDE!” and immediately regretted it.

scans.title: INCIDENT: PLANE CRASH
scans.desc: Bad news: crash. Good news: Bing Bong is now Head Scout by force of squeak.

scans.title: SUMMIT: THE PEAK (FLARE)
scans.desc: Flare launched. Bing Bong poses heroically in the wind (imaginary wind).

scans.title: DELIVERED ✅ (EST.)
scans.desc: Bing Bong has arrived. He requests a warm shelf and excessive praise.
